effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. This move can hit Pokémon under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. This move can hit Pokémon under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. This move can hit Pokémon under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop.

short_effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Bounce and Fly users.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Bounce and Fly users.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Bounce and Fly users.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user attacks the target with an uppercut thrown skyward with force.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user attacks the target with an uppercut thrown skyward with force.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user attacks the target with an uppercut thrown skyward with force.
